All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Comment
Represents a comment entity in the system.
CommentController
 
CommentCreateDto
Data Transfer Object (DTO) for creating a new comment.
CommentNotFoundException
Exception thrown when a comment is not found in the system.
CommentRepository
Repository interface for managing Comment entities.
CommentServiceApplication
The main entry point for the Comment Service application.
CommentServiceImpl
Implementation of the CommentServiceInterface that provides services related to handling comments.
CommentServiceInterface
 
KafkaConfig
Configuration class for Apache Kafka integration.
LoggingAspect
Aspect for centralized logging of application methods.
PostClient
Feign client for interacting with the Post Service API.
PostDeleteEventHandler
Handles Kafka events related to post deletions.
RedisConfig
Configuration class for Redis caching.
SwaggerConfig
Configuration class for Swagger API documentation.
UserClient
Feign client for interacting with the User Service API.
UserDeletedEventHandlerImpl
Handles Kafka events related to user deletions.
ValidationServiceImpl
Implementation of the ValidationServiceInterface that provides validation services for checking the existence of a user and a post before creating or updating a comment.
ValidationServiceInterface
Defines the contract for validation services in the application.
